title: Patient
comment: Schema of patient information from redcap.

formver.title: Form Version Number
formver.description: Form Version Number for UDS3,for version 1.2 - 3

accession.title: ADC Subject ID
accession.description: ADC Subject ID,Patient ID, Accession,for version 1.2 - 3
accession.comment: CE personnel are allowed to set this value.

category.title: 1. Patient Initial Category
category.description: For version 1.2 - 3, Option 4 Control is for version 1 only.
enum: 7 Autopsied demented relative of ADC patient
8 Autopsied non-demented relative of ADC patient

dob.title: 4. Date of birth  mm/dd/yyyy
dob.description: Patient's date of birth.Date can be submitted as MM/DD/YYYY.

astonid.title: AstonID (MRN)
astonid.description: For version 1(revised 08/29/2005) only.UTSouthwestern Aston hospital Medical Number
astonid.comment: @HIDDEN,CE personnel are allowed to set this value.

parklandid.title: ParklandID (MRN)
parklandid.description: Only in version 1(revised 08/29/2005),UTSouthwestern Parkland hospital medical Number
parklandid.comment: @HIDDEN,CE personnel are allowed to set this value.

educat.title: 6. Years of education  Enter '99' if Unknown number

excmenret.title: 7. If less than 6 years of education does the subject have a work history sufficient to exclude mental retardation?

preflang.title: 9. Language to be used for testing
enum: 9 Other/Unknown(only one may be checked and used throughout the study)

spanish.title: 10. Ethnicity (self-reported) Is subject Spanish, Hispanic or Latino

racial.title: 11. Racial Category
enum: 6 Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

aitribe.title: 12. If American Indian checked, a) what tribe?

lar_name.title: 4. LAR Name (If same as 2. Alternate Contact, write "same")

physician_name.title: Physician name
physician_name.description: For version 1(revised 08/29/2005) only.If select "2 Community Physician", what's Physician's name

which_study.title: Which study
which_study.description: For version 1(revised 08/29/2005) only.If select "4 Participation in other AD Study", which study
